SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into subtask (dividedId, itemName1, itemName2, score1, score2, randomNum, itemDes1, itemDes2) values (#{dividedid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemname1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemname2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{randomnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemdes1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{itemdes2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update subtask set dividedId = #{dividedid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, itemName1 = #{itemname1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemName2 = #{itemname2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score1 = #{score1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score2 = #{score2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, randomNum = #{randomnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, itemDes1 = #{itemdes1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, itemDes2 = #{itemdes2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where subtaskId = #{subtaskid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select subtaskId, dividedId, itemName1, itemName2, score1, score2, randomNum, itemDes1, itemDes2 from subtask where subtaskId = #{subtaskid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select subtaskId, dividedId, itemName1, itemName2, score1, score2, randomNum, itemDes1, itemDes2 from subtask
mapper.update: update subtask_lstm_nn set randomnum = #{randomnum} where subtaskid = #{subtaskid}
update subtask_cnn_tfidf set randomnum = #{randomnum} where subtaskid = #{subtaskid}
update subtask_doc_index set randomnum = #{randomnum} where subtaskid = #{subtaskid}
mapper.select: select * from subtask_lstm_nn where frequency < 5 order by randomnum

select * from subtask_doc_index where frequency < 5 order by randomnum
